flixel.util.FlxMisc

type
class
A class containing random functions that didn't fit in any other class of the util package.

Static Variables

gameContainer(accessor,null) : flash.display.Sprite

Returns the Sprite that FlxGame extends (which contains the cameras, mouse, etc)

mouseIndex(accessor,null) : Int

The Display List index of the mouse pointer

Static Methods

deepCopy<T>(v : T) : T

parameters
Value The object you want copied
returns
A copy of this object
Performs a complete object deep-copy and returns a duplicate (not a reference). This works best on anonymous objects, arrays, and classes with no function calls on their constructors.

inline openURL(URL : String) : Void

parameters
URL The address of the web page.
Opens a web page in a new tab or window.
